name: I'm Late
description:
I'm Late" is a simple arcade game, styled after productions from the 90's. The gameplay consists of passing through successive stages, in which the level of difficulty increases. Each stage involves crossing the street to avoid speeding cars. The game is designed for younger players, as well as dedicated to players who remember the climate of games from the 90's. The audiovisual setting, as well as the gameplay mechanics, allows you to revive memories associated with unforgettable 8-bit titles. The game is the first game in the "Memory Line" series, which aims to resurrect simple but playable productions, stylized as 8-bit games from the previous century.
Have fun !!!
